original_title: まりかをあなたの自宅にお届けします。失禁＆中出しSP まりか
overview: A dream event to spend with the active gravure idol "Marika" has come true! If an active gravure suddenly visits your house ... a delusion that expands just by imagining it! Marika-chan, who is noticeably weak against pushing, can't turn down her fan's masturbation, and if it's just the two of them, it's only natural that she'll masturbate for the rest of her life! I also creampie Marika!!
title: Marika Comes To Your Home. Spraying & Creampie Special: Marika
